approvedVideoIdUsers.description: IDs of users on the enterprise that are approved for custodial video ID

approvalsRequired.description: How many Enterprise Admins are required for action to fire

bitgoEthKey.description: The public portion of the ethererum key generated for the enterprise fee address

canAccessBorrowing.description: whether the enterprise has the licence for BitGo Prime Borrowing

canAccessLending.description: whether the enterprise has the licence for BitGo Prime Lending

canAccessSettlement.description: whether the enterprise has the licence to utilize settlement functionality

canAccessTrading.description: whether the enterprise has the licence to access BitGo Trading

canCreateColdWallet.description: whether the enterprise has the license to create cold wallets

canCreateCustodialWallets.description: whether the enterprise has the license to create custodial wallets

canCreateHotWallet.description: whether the enterprise has the license to create hot wallets

canCreateOffchainWallet.description: whether the enterprise has the license to create trading accounts

ethFeeAddress.description: The eth fee address used to pay for network transaction fees of this enterprise

mutablePolicyWindow.description: Time in seconds after which policies on this Enterprise cannot be updated

pricingPlan.description: The pricing plan of the enterprise
